snippet: The Russian president told a German newspaper it was premature to discuss Mr. Assad’s future but not impossible the dictator would relocate to Russia.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin hints that his country could grant asylum to Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad.
lead_paragraph: The Russian president told a German newspaper it was premature to discuss Mr. Assad’s future but not impossible the dictator would relocate to Russia.

headline.main: Putin Doesn’t Rule Out Asylum in Moscow for Syria’s Assad
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Russia: Option for a Syrian’s Exit
